Articles.Content:
Okay, so I've ran back down to the R&D dept. and asked the boffins to do a few adjustments. they refused. I bribed them with coffee. coffee always works.

http://i.imgur.com/vT8fm40.png

it appears they've also moved the periscope. good on them.

Is awesome,this IVA,and the periscope to the center, have Access the crew members !

I guess they figured that the way the periscope was mounted was a bit wonky, weird, and generally unfair. seems like good logic.

Just a quick note that they told me to include: the seats won't just be cushions, the back is just invisible in this diagram in order for us to see the control panels.
Yes is balanced now!
hmm, caffeine seems to be really effective at speeding up the R&D process. let's throw down a few pitchers of Recaf Koffee and see what we get...
I drink four coffees every day...i can't wake up if i don't drink coffee!

Wow! that Recaf Koffee really does the trick! unsafe for kerbal consumption my butt!

behold: the Rockomax Dockomax pod!

Wow! that Recaf Koffee really does the trick! unsafe for kerbal consumption my butt!

http://i.imgur.com/93eIZD0.png

behold: the Rockomax Dockomax pod!

Beautiful! Hey if you need beta testers I can help and can also test Deadly Reentry and Ferram Aerospace Research compatibility which many people (like me) use

Beautiful! Hey if you need beta testers I can help and can also test Deadly Reentry and Ferram Aerospace Research compatibility which many people (like me) use

ay, thanks for the proposition! so far, I haven't even gotten a single part into the game yet, but when the time comes, You'll be the first to know!

ay, thanks for the proposition! so far, I haven't even gotten a single part into the game yet, but when the time comes, You'll be the first to know!

Thanks man! glad to help

Also, what color palettes were you thinking of using? (if you have any yet)

for the UNIN-10 probably a darkish brooding olive (imagine that!)

for the dockomax probably a nasa-ish off white tiling.

for the UNIN-10 probably a darkish brooding olive (imagine that!)

for the dockomax probably a nasa-ish off white tiling.

Okay cool the best mods tend to be stock friendly and having the off white with a decal color really makes it so my suggestion for the dockomax would be to take the file for the Mark 1-2 pod and eyedrop about 5 different colors off of it to assemble a palette then choose a pastel decal color of your liking (red, blue, etc.) and use that palette when you go about texturing

Keep it cool

Well, I am trying to keep it stockalike, so I hope it does play well with other parts!

hmmmm

do you think that the engineers down at the VAB are Koffeee powered too?

WOW! they made a whole new part in just a day! introducing the SLM-24 engine!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

cool cool.

so it turns out that in the process of shipping more koffee beans from Kafrika, the truck capsized and broke open. right next to the VAB. and so, the engineers, still high on Koffee, enthusiastically ran over to the now spilled pile of beans and. erm. ate them all.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

so now they've added lots of lovely gubbins to the UNIN-10 pod. that's as far as they could get before the S.W.A.T team arrived.

are kerbal engineer-sized straitjackets filed under business expenses in tax forms?
any feedback on the recent little things I've added?
Good, but feels unpolished.
unpolished in what way?
love the look of the capsule and the engine!
Shiny! I eagerly await an in-game release.

Shiny! I eagerly await an in-game release.

i agree, i can't wait to use this along with the Soy-juice from HGR
THIS IS SO AWESOEME! AWESOME WORK!!! is it okay if I use that in my main post?
oh... he's not online...

THIS IS SO AWESOEME! AWESOME WORK!!! is it okay if I use that in my main post?

Ofcourse mate!
thanks mate!
